name: Raided the Gods Warehouse
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: The Tower’s peace was shattered by the Outer invaders and the Great War of Gods and Demons, leading to the extinction of humanity.In the midst of it all, the only survivor, ‘Jeong Sewoon,’ embarks on a mission to undo everything.He discovers the Demon’s Vault, created by the Demon of Greed, within the depths of the Demonic War.Inside the vault, he finds the Hourglass of Chronos, capable of turning back time!‘If I go back to the past, stop the Great War, ascend the Tower, and personally fend off
